description: This Dart file provides utility functions for date and time formatting, including relative time strings and locale-aware date formatting, primarily using the intl package.

classes.name: DateFormatUtils
classes.description: A utility class offering static methods for human-friendly date and time formatting.

methods.name: sanityString
methods.description: Returns a fixed date string ('Jan 1, 2000') for sanity or testing purposes.

methods.name: showRelative
methods.description: Generates a human-readable string indicating how much time has passed since the provided DateTime.

methods.name: showShortDate
methods.description: Formats a DateTime into a short, locale-aware date string.

methods.name: showTime
methods.description: Formats a DateTime into a locale-aware time string.

methods.name: showFullDateTime
methods.description: Formats a DateTime into a combined date and time string.

methods.name: parseIsoOrNow
methods.description: Parses an ISO8601 string into a DateTime; falls back to current time if parsing fails.
